item.title: Clans
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

The chances of Davidi2 responding are pretty non existent, considering he stepped down in January, and wasn’t active for 5 months prior to that.

I’ll be honest I do like the server in its current form, though there are a few slight issues that need addressing (and will be addressed), aside from that I feel we have an appropriate balance. I think you’re forgetting that your definition of fun isn’t everyones definition of fun.

We have implemented ways to fix xraying in the past, unfortunately due to complications with Bukkit and the plugin itself we’ve been unable to sustain such plugins. Duping will always be an issue in minecraft, as new versions are released people get there before we do, as far as I’m aware there isn’t one universal fix to duping.

We’re aware that there are some dupes and are working on it. In regards to your world size argument I completely disagree, if anything limiting the world size has had a positive effect on the server - it allows easy report solving and a closer community. A more populated and socially intractable community as well.

You effectively want to completely reconfigure the entire server into something it never was if I’m reading your post correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Clans
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Tbh I’m not going to lie. We need to wipe the whole server and start fresh. I know it might just seem like I’m saying that because I just got back but thats where I’m trying to get, the server 10x more fun before when it had unlimited space to explore, none of this if you run out of space it’ll be expanded. Also enough of this world 1 is better than world 2 just get rid of a world and focus on the positives that the server had when it first started. Also we need to knuckle down and find out a way to fix xray (if its possible) and duping. I’ve only been back for a few days and I’ve already found a way to dupe. MITB, David message me if you want to know, I think you’ll know this method already though.

Read full topic

item.title: Clans
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It’s neat, but I’m not sure if it’s the way we want to go with the server or not. Just for completeness sake, if we use this plugin, we would also enable this one for dynmap:
http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/dynmap-simpleclans/

And maybe even have a PHP front-end to show stats and such:
http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/simpleclansstats/

Read full topic
